name: _deadSet
description:
Twin-stick roguelite shooter of endless zombie waves. Inmates of the regional prison have turned into zombies for some unknown reason... Doesn't matter because they are trying to kill you. You got two weapons to defend yourself from them, a trusty rifle and a reliable shotgun, both complement each other. Using strategy and some dance moves... Survive as long as you can! Help will arrive soon... Probably... Controls: 
  • Left Click: Shoot your rifle
  • Right Click: Shoot your shotgun
  • Press / Hold → R / Space : Reload your shotgun
  • SHOOT YOUR SHOTGUN TO RELOAD YOUR RIFLE
